topic.title: Longitudinal Care Wound Observation (V2) - conformance rules

section.p: This template represents acquired or surgical wounds and is not intended to encompass all wound types. The template applies to wounds such as pressure ulcers, surgical incisions, and deep tissue injury wounds. Information in this template may include information about the wound measurements characteristics.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-29473, CONF:1198-29474, CONF:1198-32913 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.114"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Problem Observation2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1198-31012)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1198-31013)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-29476)/@code="ASSERTION" assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1198-29477, CONF:1198-31010)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Wound Type 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.2.6 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-29485)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-29488)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31542)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

SHOULD contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-29495, CONF:1198-29496, CONF:1198-29497)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Wound Measurement Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.133)

SHOULD contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-29503, CONF:1198-29504, CONF:1198-29505)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Wound Characteristic (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.134)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-31890, CONF:1198-31891, CONF:1198-31892)
When the wound observed is a type of pressure ulcer, then this template SHOULD contain an entry for the Number of Pressure Ulcers.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Number Of Pressure Ulcers Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.76:2015-08-01)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-31893, CONF:1198-31894, CONF:1198-31919)
When the wound observed is a type of pressure ulcer, then this template SHOULD contain an entry for the Highest Pressure Ulcer Stage.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Highest Pressure Ulcer Stage (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.77)
SHALL conform to Problem Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
SHALL conform to Problem Observation2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1198-31012)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1198-31013)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:1198-10139)
The negationInd is used to indicate the absence of the condition in observation/value. A negationInd of "true" coupled with an observation/value of SNOMED code 64572001 "Disease (disorder)" indicates that the patient has no known conditions.
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9043, R2.1=CONF:1198-9043)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-29476)/@code="ASSERTION" assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1198-29477, CONF:1198-31010)
contain zero or one [0..1] text
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1198-9049)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1198-19112)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-9050)
If the problem is known to be resolved, but the date of resolution is not known, then the high element SHALL be present, and the nullFlavor attribute SHALL be set to 'UNK'. Therefore, the existence of an high element within a problem does indicate that the problem has been resolved.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Wound Type 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.2.6 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-29485)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-29488)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Age At Onset) such that it (CONF:9059, CONF:9060, CONF:15590, R2.1=CONF:1198-9059, R2.1=CONF:1198-9060, R2.1=CONF:1198-15590)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Age Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.31)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Problem Status) such that it (CONF:9063, CONF:9068, CONF:15591)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Problem Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.6)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Health Status) such that it (CONF:9067, CONF:9064, CONF:15592)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Health Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31147)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-29951, CONF:1198-31531, CONF:1198-29952)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Prognosis Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.113)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-31063, CONF:1198-31532, CONF:1198-31064)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Priority Preference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-9063, CONF:1198-9068, CONF:1198-15591)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Problem Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.6)

contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it
Conforms to Health Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31542)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

SHOULD contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-29495, CONF:1198-29496, CONF:1198-29497)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Wound Measurement Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.133)

SHOULD contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-29503, CONF:1198-29504, CONF:1198-29505)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Wound Characteristic (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.134)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-31890, CONF:1198-31891, CONF:1198-31892)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Number Of Pressure Ulcers Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.76:2015-08-01)
When the wound observed is a type of pressure ulcer, then this template SHOULD contain an entry for the Number of Pressure Ulcers.

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-31893, CONF:1198-31894, CONF:1198-31919)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Highest Pressure Ulcer Stage (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.77)
When the wound observed is a type of pressure ulcer, then this template SHOULD contain an entry for the Highest Pressure Ulcer Stage.
The text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15587)
reference, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @value (CONF:15588)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15589)
The effectiveTime element , if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:15603)
effectiveTime, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:15604)
value MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:10141)

If the diagnosis is unknown or the SNOMED code is unknown, @nullFlavor SHOULD be UNK. If the code is something other than SNOMED, @nullFlavor SHOULD be OTH and the other code SHOULD be placed in the translation element (CONF:10142)
entryRelationship with target entry Age Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:9069, R2.1=CONF:9069)
value MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translation (CONF:16749, R2.1=CONF:1198-16749)
translation, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @code (CodeSystem: ICD10CM 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 STATIC) (CONF:16750, R2.1=CONF:1198-16750)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
effectiveTime, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:1198-15603)
effectiveTime, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:1198-15604)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
